${ModID}:GoldenPick.NAME: Golden Pick
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: NL ${ModID}:Pickup: Gain !M! *Gold plus !${ModID}:m2! *Gold for each card in your deck.

${ModID}:DeckCheck.NAME: Deck Check
${ModID}:DeckCheck.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to the larger of your draw or discard pile sizes.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: NL ${ModID}:Pickup: Gain the other reward cards with a {0}.

${ModID}:BigBoots.NAME: Big Boots
${ModID}:BigBoots.DESCRIPTION: If your draw or discard pile has !${ModID}:m2!+ cards, draw !M! cards. NL Draw 1 card.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: NL ${ModID}:Pickup: Add a *Stack to your deck.

${ModID}:PackGear.NAME: Pack Gear
${ModID}:PackGear.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 ${ModID}:Metallicize plus 1 for every !M! cards in your draw and discard piles combined.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: NL ${ModID}:Pickup: Add an *Aggregate to your deck.

${ModID}:TouchedByFlame.NAME: Touched by Flame
${ModID}:TouchedByFlame.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! ${ModID}:Ignite. NL Apply !${ModID}:m2! Weak. NL Apply !${ModID}:m2! Vulnerable.

${ModID}:TreasureChest.NAME: Treasure Chest
${ModID}:TreasureChest.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Exhaust. NL Remove this from your deck after playing it !M! {!M!|1=time|@=times}.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: NL ${ModID}:Pickup: Gain a random common relic.

${ModID}:GrabAndGo.NAME: Grab and Go
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: NL ${ModID}:Pickup/Removed: Gain/lose a *QuestionÂ Card. NL Remove this from your deck after the act boss.

${ModID}:Transmogrifier.NAME: Transmogrifier
${ModID}:Transmogrifier.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL stslib:Startup: Transform the ${ModID}:lowest_rarity card in your deck.
${ModID}:Transmogrifier.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. Ethereal. NL stslib:Startup: Transform the ${ModID}:lowest_rarity card in your deck.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: NL ${ModID}:Pickup: Gain a random common card.

${ModID}:DarkBargain.NAME: Dark Bargain
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: NL ${ModID}:Pickup: Gain a random potion, Upgrade a random card, gain a random card, and gain an *Injury.
